title: Gyphi
description: Gyphi - GIFs app that allows you to not only browse and save your favorite GIFs but also create an account to save and organize your favorites. With Gyphi, you can easily copy the link to any GIF and share it with your friends. Whether you want to share an adorable animal GIF, Gyphi has you covered!

title: TiDi List
description: TiDi List, the ultimate note-taking app that goes beyond just notes. With TiDi List, you can create, edit, and delete notes with ease. But that's not all - we've also integrated a sleek weather widget that allows you to check the weather for any city in the world. Plan your day, stay organized, and stay informed about the weather, all in one place!

title: Fun with Flags
description: Introducing event-planning app - FunWithFlags! With FunWithFlags, you can create events and easily add the time of the event. But that's not all - we've also integrated a feature that allows you to add other countries and automatically displays the corresponding time in that country. Share your events with friends and family, and even post them on social networks. Events timezone converter with flags.

title: Repo
description: Compilation and organization of a wide variety of tools and resources for web developers and designers.

title: H-ISENA
description: Medical records management system for the Institute of Senology Aragua; integral platform that allows the efficient registration and administration of patients and their medical records. This system has three user levels, guarantees secure authentication, generates detailed reports and prints medical records. Its implementation optimizes patient care, improves internal management and facilitates appointment scheduling, contributing significantly to the quality of healthcare services.

title: SALUS
description: Salus is a comprehensive platform that simplifies the management of medical consultations and patients for healthcare professionals and medical entities. With Salus, we seek to optimize professionals' time, improve the patient experience and ensure more efficient medical care. With an accessible and easy-to-use design, the platform is perfect for hospitals, clinics and practices looking to modernize their administrative management.

title: Sphere
description: Sphere is your ultimate gateway to the captivating world of anime, offering a web application that allows users to explore a vast collection ranging from timeless classics to the latest releases. With an intuitive and responsive interface, you can easily search for your favorite series by name, rating, or category, making it simple to discover new titles tailored to your preferences. Users can save their favorite animes in a dedicated list for easy access anytime, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable browsing experience as you dive into the anime universe.
